name: Telegram Gcloner
description: Allows you to use gclone on telegram.

ENV.description: Fill this if you using environ variable as config.

USER_IDS.description: Your Telegram ID (multiple separated by commas, first ID is admin)

GROUP_IDS.description: Your Group ID (multiple separated by commas, first ID is admin)

GCLONE_PARA_OVERRIDE.description: If you don't know what this is, leave it blank.
